text: Metopivaria elongata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1976, originally under the genus Heterometopia.BioLib.cz - Metopivaria elongata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Homonoeini Category:Beetles described in 1976
title: Metopivaria elongata
